welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nantang, China! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's rich history, beautiful architecture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Nantang has to offer.

restaurants.name: KFC (肯德基)
restaurants.description: KFC (肯德基) is a fast food restaurant located in 石岐街道.
restaurants.address: 太阳城, 石岐街道, 广东

restaurants.name: Pizza Hut (必胜客)
restaurants.description: Pizza Hut (必胜客) is a pizzeria located in 石岐街道.

restaurants.name: 崖口人家
restaurants.description: 崖口人家 is a cantonese restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: 大家乐海鲜酒家
restaurants.description: 大家乐海鲜酒家 is a seafood restaurant located in 石岐街道.
restaurants.address: 南朗镇南苑路1号, 石岐街道, 广东

restaurants.name: McDonald's (麦当劳)
restaurants.description: McDonald's (麦当劳) is a fast food restaurant located in 中山市.
restaurants.address: 东镇大道（金汇豪庭） (张家边东镇分店), 中山市, 广东

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shenzhen Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Shenzhen Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a Chinese phone number for registration.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost carriers and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hong Kong International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Hong Kong International Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a registration is required.
